welcome.title: Build Better Habits
welcome.description: Track your daily habits, build streaks, and become the best version of yourself.

streaks.title: Build Powerful Streaks
streaks.description: Complete habits consistently to build streaks. Long streaks earn bonus XP!

reminders.title: Never Miss a Day
reminders.description: Set reminders to get notified at the perfect time to complete your habits.

gamification.title: Earn XP & Level Up

tips.eliminateDistractions: Eliminate distractions before starting the timer

focusScore.whatIsDescription: The Focus Score measures your concentration level based on the ratio between your effective work time and the breaks you take. A higher score indicates better ability to maintain focus.
focusScore.noDataDescription: Complete a work session with the timer to see your Focus Score

weekly.comingSoon: Coming soon: Detailed weekly statistics, comparison with previous weeks, and trend metrics.

aiLearning.title: How AI Learning works?
aiLearning.description: Ordo's AI system automatically learns from your work patterns every time you complete a session with the timer. You don't need to do anything extra.
